Articles.Content:
Mountains get higher than hills.

Migori pit.

I hire 1,000,000,000 minions with excavators to turn them into hills again. 

All the hills in the universe are now mine.

all my hills and migori hill.
*ASMR space war for all the hills*

On 5/31/2018 at 3:01 PM, Fraston said:

I hire 1,000,000,000 minions with excavators to turn them into hills again. 

All the hills in the universe are now mine.

all my hills and migori hill.

I delete your .cfg from the Universe’s file.

My hills.

Mwauhhahaha! It turns out it installed protogent!

I forcefully claim back most of the hills and migori hill.

Lots of hills and migori hill.
The Hill Empire's colony fleets return to the motherhill to re-establish the Hill Empire.
Do they carry tea?
No, they carry minmus mint ice cream, as it was a space fleet sent to colonize extra-terrestrial hills.
Extra-terrestriall hill anti-colonialist mode activated.

All of my hills sprout large laser cannons. 

these prevent frontal assault.

My protected hills and migori hill.

I delete the universe and make a new one, then I make a new hill in the new universe.

My interuniversal hill.

The universe still has protogent. There are now two universes. Due to an error, I am now a god. I bridge the gap between them and make more hills with my god powers.

My godly hills.

Edited June 5, 2018 by Fraston

Two universes annihilate.
The hill is restored with default settings.

I turn Hill Graphics Quality down to 1%.

While you attempt to find your hill against the Minecraft-like graphics, I make a new one.

My hill.

I was killed in the annihilation of the universes, but reborn in the new existence. I raid your hill and restore the graphics quality. 

My high-definition hill.
As after your rebirth you are just a bodiless emulation, the hill antivirus discards your changes.

My soul obtains an extreme nihilistic point of view, it causes @kerbiloid to have such a powerful paradigm shift that their brain gets fried. 

My nihilistic hill and dead @kerbiloid.
Unfortunately for you, kerbiloid has a scheduled restore. If he doesn't respond for 15 minutes, a service automatically restores him from backup.

My soul Implants suggestions into the heads of foundry workers, after a fitting body for my soul is fabricated, i brainwash them and take the host.

My appearance scares everyone so much that I walk into the hill without opposition.

My hill.

You have successfully walked into hill.

After extinguishing fire and filling the pit with clean sand, they get a noone's hill.

*akward silence*

 My soul breaks the silence by summoning a god and taking their powers. 

I am a god yet again. It is the least of my powers to claim the hill and everything on it.

I use a Vulcan Death Grip on you. While you are incapacitated, I take the hill.

My hill.

When I wake up 5 seconds after you take the hill, I summon a portal into hell and suck you into it.

My hill.

 

Edited June 7, 2018 by Fraston

You can't close the portal.

Oops.

Empty hill with hell portal.

Edited June 7, 2018 by kerbiloid

Or can I? You are trapped in hell and can’t get out.

My hill.
